_meta.source: Researched from TripAdvisor, Singapore Tourism Board, and local guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Marina Bay, Sentosa, Orchard Road, and zoo area

label_overrides.gardens-by-the-bay: Gardens by the Bay (Supertrees & Cloud Forest)
label_overrides.maxwell-food-centre: Maxwell Food Centre (Tian Tian Chicken Rice)

transit_routes.name: MRT (Mass Rapid Transit)
transit_routes.note: World-class metro system. Buy Singapore Tourist Pass for unlimited travel.

transit_routes.name: Marina Bay Walking Tour
transit_routes.note: All Marina Bay attractions walkable. Use air-conditioned underground links.

featured_experiences.name: Gardens by the Bay
featured_experiences.note: Free outdoor gardens, paid conservatories. Light show at 7:45pm and 8:45pm nightly.

featured_experiences.name: Hawker Center Food Tour
featured_experiences.note: Singapore's UNESCO-listed hawker culture. Expect $3-8 per dish.

featured_experiences.name: Night Safari
featured_experiences.note: Opens 7:15pm. Book ahead for Creatures of the Night show. 30 min from downtown.
